1111001010101100 0110000001010111 0 -> sum: 0101001100000011, cout: 1
0010101101011100 0100011111100110 0 -> sum: 0111001101000010, cout: 0
1011001100000101 0111100001111010 1 -> sum: 0010101110000000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
